chandika hathurusinha mahatha shri lanka pile puhunukaru lesa paminenne nam thama itha kamaththen eeta anumathiya laba dena bawath, ohu itha aadarayen piliganna bawath krida amathiwaraya kiya sitiyeya.

raja pawule thawaduratath radi sitimin nidahasa bhukthi widimata hari kumaru saha megan kumariyata brithanyaye dewana elisabeth maharajinage awasaraya himi wi thibenawa.ee, raja pawule sandi්ranham mandiraye eeye pawathi thiranathmaka sakachchawakin anathuruwayi.ee anuwa hari kumaru saha megan kumariyata kanadawe saha brithanyaye radi sitimata awasara himi wanawa.thaman jyeshta rajakiyathwayen iwath wi, uthuru amarikawe saha brithanyaye radi sitimata adahas karana bawath, mulyamaya swadhinathwayak apeksha karana bawath hari kumaru saha megan kumariya pasugiya badada niwedanaya kale raja pawula mawithayata path karamin.kese namuth, owunge apekshawanta sahaya wana athara hari saha megange rajakiyathwaya awasan nowana bawa maharajina eeye pawathi sakachchawalin anathuruwa awadharanaya kala.
juliyas sisarge kalaye dina 30 k pebarawariyata ayathwa thibuni.
ese ma obath dinana pinisa duwanna. 25 dinana pinisa wirya karana sama kridakayek ma hama athin ma dadi puhunuwak labayi.

kolambaa jathika rohale prathikara labana hruda rogiyaku wana aar. ech. em. palitha herath pawaru paminillak salaka balu kolambaa pradhana disa winisuru pradip hettiaarachchi mahatha me waranaya nikuth kaleya.ada saha heta kriyathmaka kirimata kandawa athi me heda paripuraka athuru waidya sewa warjanaya nithi wirodhi, rajaya magin samastha roginta nomilaye sapayana waidya prathikara laba ganimata athi ayithiya ullanghanaya karana kriyadamayak bawath paminilla wenuwen karunu dakwu janadhipathi nithignya fayisar musthapa mahatha pawasiya.illim kipayak mulkaraganimin pawathwana me warjanaya wruththiya samithi agnya panathata ganena karmika aarawulak mulkaraganimin pawathwana wruththiya aragalayak nowana bawath me magin roginge jiwitha pawa awadhanamakata lakwana bawath pawasu musthapa mahatha ratata pirimasiya nohaki paduwak sidukarana warjanaya athhituwana lesata adhikaranayen illa sitiyeya.shri lanka mahajana saukhya parikshaka sangamaya, widyuth wikarpana rekhana shilpi sangamaya, rajaye aushadhawedinge sangamaya, shri lanka akshi thakshanawedinge sangamaya, kanthu rekhana shilpi sangamaya, rajaye daththa shilpi sangamaya, waidya parikshana thakshana widyagnya sangamaya, rajaye wikirana widya thakshanawedi sangamaya, rajaye bhautha chikithsaka sangamaya, rajaye kita widya sahakarawarunge sangamaya, mahajana saukhya rasayanagara shilpi sangamaya, rajaye kasal dantha chikithsaka sangamaya, shri lanka wruththiya chikithsaka sangamaya,samastha lanka suwa sewa sangamaya ha shri lanka pawul saukhya sewa sangamayata me warana niyoga nikuth kerini.nithignya sanjaya fonseka mahathage upades paridi nithignya isuru balapatabadi, meheran karim mahathwaruda paminilla wenuwen peni sitiyeya.paminille karunu salaka balu disa winisuruwaraya withthikara sangamwalata warana niyogaya da athuru thahanam danwim nothisi nikuth karamin labana 11 dina adhikaranaye karunu dakwana lesata niyoga kaleya..
